description_top: Kitāb al-Rawḍah fī al-ṭibb (The Meadow in Medicine)
catalogue_description: Fihrist: Union Catalogue of Manuscripts from the Islamicate World
title: Kitāb al-Rawḍah fī al-ṭibb (The Meadow in Medicine)
author: Thābit ibn Qurrah (d. 901)
description: The Bodleian copy of this general treatise on therapeutics is the only recorded copy.
